title: The Reincarnated Young Lady Aims to Be an Adventurer - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Cute Story   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist   Guilds   Magic   Magic Beasts   Monster Tamer   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Ninjas   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sister Complex   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Oda Hiro   小田 ヒロ
description: When the Earl’s daughter, Serafiona, met the Holy Beast, she realized that she had reincarnated as the villainess of a fantasy novel that she had read in her previous life. This is the story of Serafiona avoiding her worst fate and her dream to become an adventurer with the Holy Beast, Lu.>
